name: Colphene Uni NG Riser Pit (ITC)
Details
Substrate - To Pile Base
All surfaces dry, clean, smooth and free from sharp objects, laitance, oils, grease or any foreign materials which may inhibit or reduce adhesion.
Commencement of installation shall be taken as acceptance of the substrate by the Applicator
Colphene BSW UNI NG - To Raft Slab
Confirm rolls stored upright, with the selvedge side on top. If the product is stored outdoors confirm covered with an protective cover
Check COLPHENE BSW UNI NG thickness is 4mm
Apply COLPHENE BSW UNI NG loose laid on blinding concrete
Confirm minimum 100 mm side overlap
Confirm minimum 150 mm end lap between each strip
Confirm end laps are staggered by at least 300 mm
Confirm laps avoid excessive layering
Visual inspection of joint welds at cross laps
Confirm no laps at capping beam construction joint
Confirm all side laps are sealed and end laps by heat-welding the selvedge with a propane torch and minimum 3-8mm bleed
Confirm all angle changes (inside and outside corners) are reinforced by heat-welding on additional 300 mm piece of COLPHENE BSW UNI NG centered on the angle
Colphene BSW UNI NG Reiforcement Strip - Floor/Wall Junction and Existing Wall Upturn
Confirm rolls stored upright, with the selvedge side on top. If the product is stored outdoors confirm covered with an protective cover
Check COLPHENE BSW UNI NG thickness is 4mm
Confirm minimum 100 mm side overlap
Confirm minimum 150 mm end lap between each strip
Confirm end laps are staggered by at least 300 mm
Confirm laps avoid excessive layering
Visual inspection of joint welds at cross laps
Confirm no laps at capping beam construction joint
Confirm all side laps are sealed and end laps by heat-welding the selvedge with a propane torch and minimum 3-8mm bleed
WPA Injection System - To Insitu Wall Junctions with Slab, Existing Wall and Itself
Verify all components for installation are in the kit
Verify kit is not damaged
Install and fix hose to construction joins
Install Injection box(es) in agreed locations
Feed hoses into injection boxes
Clip and cap hoses
Colphene BSW UNI NG - To Insitu Walls
ANTIROCK PRIMER can be applied with a brush or roller on clean, dry substrates free of any residue that may hinder adherence. Shake well before using.
It must be thoroughly dry before applying the waterproofing membrane. Drying time will vary depending on air and surface temperature and humidity.
Confirm rolls stored upright, with the selvedge side on top. If the product is stored outdoors confirm covered with an protective cover
Check COLPHENE BSW UNI NG thickness is 4mm
Confirm minimum 100 mm side overlap
Confirm minimum 150 mm end lap between each strip
Confirm end laps are staggered by at least 300 mm
Confirm laps avoid excessive layering
Visual inspection of joint welds at cross laps
Confirm no laps at capping beam construction joint
Confirm all side laps are sealed and end laps by heat-welding the selvedge with a propane torch and minimum 3-8mm bleed
Confirm all angle changes (inside and outside corners) are reinforced by heat-welding on additional 300 mm piece of COLPHENE BSW UNI NG centered on the angle
Sopradrain 20 - To Insitu Walls
The substrate must be firm, even, clean and free from loose materials or any construction debris on the surface.
Install SOPRADRAIN 20 with the geotextile facing the backfill.
Join by simply butting edge to edge and overlapping the geotextile overhang and securing with reinforced canvastape
Terminate SOPRADRAIN 20 by nailing pressure bar at required height
WPA 100 - To Top of Raft Slab
Mix well the product before use

WPA100 is applied with a with a brush or a roller in two (2) layers. Application must be a minimum of 2 coats @ >= 1.2kg/m2 per coat to achieve a dry film thickness not less than 2mm as per the technical data sheet.
Ready to recoat after 2 hours. Dry: 24 hours (remains tacky to touch).
Store WPA 100 in chemical bunds provided by Delta
CHECKLIST COMPLETE AND SIGNED
ITC completed
Colphene Uni NG Riser Pit ITP
Details
CAPPING BEAM WATERPROOFING ITP
Sample Submissions Approved
Shop Drawings Approved
Colphene BSW UNI NG Installed - To Raft Slab Blinding
Colphene BSW UNI NG Upturn to Installed - Existing Wall
Colphene BSW UNI NG Reiforcement Strip Installed - Floor/Wall Junction
Injection System Installed - To Insitu Walls
Primer Installed - To Insitu Walls
Colphene BSW UNI NG Installed - To Insitu Walls
Sopradrain Installed - To Insitu Walls
WPA 100 Installed - To Top of Raft Slab
